titles.title: Civilian Extraterritorial Jurisdiction Act (CEJA) of 2011
A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to clarify and expand Federal criminal jurisdiction over Federal contractors and employees outside the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3500-3501)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Date of scheduled consideration. SD-226. 10:00 a.m.
